attributes.action: Compel the government to cancel 2016 Key Stage One SATs and formal TAs
attributes.additional_details: Please read the NUT and NAHT press releases for more information.
attributes.background: The SATs introduced this year are poorly implemented and designed. Last minute changes and requirements increase workload and stress.Expectations are unfair and unrealistic for most 6/7 year olds. Children, schools and teachers will be labelled as failures and their futures put at risk.
